description: This file implements the core functions for the PsmSysRegistry object in the Persistent Storage Manager component. It includes object creation, removal, enrollment of dependent objects, and initialization. The code manages object lifecycle, external interface setup, and timer configurations for the registry subsystem.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE PsmSysroCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new instance of the PsmSysRegistry object, setting up function pointers and enrolling necessary objects.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmSysroRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the PsmSysRegistry object, freeing associated resources and memory.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmSysroEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Allocates and initializes dependent interface objects such as configuration interface, file loader, memory interface, info repository, and timer objects, and sets up their relations.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS PsmSysroInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the PsmSysRegistry object, setting default property values and function pointers, and prepares the object for operation.
